CIAttributeDescription: Distorts the pixels starting at the circumference of a circle and emanating outward.

inputImage.CIAttributeDescription: The image to use as an input image. For filters that also use a background image, this is the foreground image.

inputRadius.CIAttributeDescription: The radius determines how many pixels are used to create the distortion. The larger the radius, wider the extent of the distortion.

inputCenter.CIAttributeDescription: The x and y position to use as the center of the distortion.
